scripts.test: echo 'running tests 🧪' && jest --coverage && echo '✅ All tests passed'
scripts.lint-check: echo 'checking your code for linting issues 🤔' && eslint ./src/ && echo '✅ Your code passes lint check'
scripts.format-check: echo 'Checking the formatting of your code 👨‍💻' && prettier --check ./src/ && echo '✅ code matches prettier formatting'
